refactor: restructure codebase into clean architecture with modular design

Refactored monolithic script.js into 8 separate modules following clean 
architecture principles with clear separation of concerns:

- config.js: centralized configuration and constants
- ui-controller.js: DOM manipulation and UI state management
- three-setup.js: Three.js scene initialization and rendering
- model-loader.js: 3D model loading for multiple formats
- animation-controller.js: animation state and playback
- sprite-generator.js: sprite rendering from 8 directions
- file-handler.js: file I/O and ZIP archive creation
- app.js: main orchestrator and animation loop

Added CLAUDE.md documentation covering architecture, module dependencies,
and extension points for future development.

All original functionality preserved. Script loading order in index.html
updated to load modules in correct dependency sequence.

- equipment-manager.js: axisCorrection with hardcoded rotation offsets
- animation-controller.js: generateBoneMapping(), retargetAnimation()
- animation-controller.js: calculateRestPoseOffsets(), calculateHierarchicalOffsets()
- Properties: boneMapping, axisCorrection

- equipment-manager.js: skeleton analysis, auto-mapping, manual mapping
- animation-controller.js: debug tools (analyzeAnimation, diagnoseBoneOrientation, etc.)
